divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a loud, scary noise and it flew by very quickly. I had just gotten homefrom work when i saw it fly by. I first noticed the object because of theamount of light it produced and the noise it made I thought it was a weatherbaloon, but soon realized that it was not. I was hot, disoriented, and dazed asit flew by, like it affected me. It just flew by very fast, maybe 300mph. Ilost sight when it just dissapeared along the horizon. I was really scared.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around May 13th 2002
